title: Executive Order 7702-Amendment of Paragraph 6, Subdivision IX, Schedule A of Civil Service Rules
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by paragraph Eighth, subdivision SECOND, section 2 of the Civil Service Act (22 Stat. 404), it is ordered that paragraph 6 of Subdivision IX of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules be, and it is hereby, amended to read as follows:
"6. Two assistants to the Secretary in the office of the Secretary of Agriculture."
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7702-Amendment of Paragraph 6, Subdivision IX, Schedule A of Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371752
